resources.string: A Stolperstein ("stumbling block") is a ten-centimetre concrete cube bearing a brass plate inscribed with the name and life dates of victims of Nazi extermination or persecution. -Wikipedia
By the end of 2016, Gunter Demnig and his co-workers had installed about 60,000 stones in more than 1,200 towns and cities throughout Europe
DETAILS ABOUT WHAT IS WRITTEN \n ON \n STOLPERSTEINE
